description.value: You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying juggernaut on the battlefield. Your animal companion becomes trained in Intimidation. If your animal companion uses Support while serving as your mount, it grants you the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Aid] reaction on your first Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] on the same turn, even though it can't take reactions.
